description: Change use of unit from storage (Class B8) to vehicle MOT centre (Sui Generis); installing scissor lift with pit
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Change of use - retail/service/takeaway/etc to dwellinghouses
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): PL.1 REV A (EXISTING AND PROPOSED FLOOR PLANS); PL.2 REV A (LOCATION PLAN); PL.3 REV A (EXISTING BLOCK PLAN)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
